project.name: Semedico ElasticSearch Index Setup
project.description: This project's main purpose is to efficiently generate the JSON describing the Semedico indexes. To this end, each index is modeled as a Java class that can easily be serialized into the correct JSON format. One large advantage is the possibility to use inheritence to model shared properties across indexes. Shell scripts are then used to run the Java program and create the actual indexes in an ElasticSearch server.
